note: Each 3x3 matrix maps source coordinates to viewer coordinates (X,Y,Z). It is applied to world-space points as p' = M * p (implemented as pts @ M^T). Use the Flip toggles in the UI to correct handedness if needed.

presets.label: Axis Studio (fixed)
presets.description: Fixed Axis Studio assumption for this prototype: source is Y-up, viewer is Z-up. We apply a +90deg rotation around X (Y-up -> Z-up). If the character is mirrored or faces the wrong way, use Flip toggles.

presets.label: Z-up to Y-up (rotate -90deg around X)
presets.description: Common conversion when source uses Z as up-axis.

presets.label: Swap Y and Z
presets.description: Simple axis swap. May require a flip to keep a right-handed system.

presets.label: Swap X and Z
presets.description: Simple axis swap. May require a flip to keep a right-handed system.

presets.label: Swap X and Y
presets.description: Simple axis swap. May require a flip to keep a right-handed system.
